content:
# Factorio Agent Report - Steps 0-15

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation (Water -> Steam -> Electricity)
*   **Purpose:** Generates electricity from water using coal as fuel.
*   **Components:**
    *   Offshore Pump at x=-9.5 y=-0.5 (Extracts water)
    *   Boiler at x=-5.0 y=2.5 (Heats water to steam using coal) - *Note: Currently out of fuel.*
    *   Steam Engine at x=0.5 y=6.5 (Generates electricity from steam) - *Note: Currently not connected/working due to lack of steam.*
    *   PipeGroup connecting Offshore Pump to Boiler (Pipes starting at x=-8.5 y=-0.5)
    *   PipeGroup connecting Boiler to Steam Engine (Pipes starting at x=-3.5 y=3.5)

### Crude Oil Extraction
*
